{"name": "Met Council - Boro Park Chesed Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Appointments can be made by calling 718-608-7065
* Register online at https://forms.office.com/pages/responsepage.aspx?id=zssOPkup7EG8Y7KABK7UKfF1IoRrgp1Iin5Onhc2iXpURFZJSVhGSVFFTDJNWUk4NUY1R0laWkpYNS4u
* Assists clients with SNAP applications, Social Security, Medicaid and Medicare, and other safety net benefits from the city, state, and federal government
* May be closed during Jewish Holidays", "email": "", "url": "https://www.queensjewishlink.com/index.php/local/26-community-corner/4493-met-council-opens-beautiful-new-chesed-center-to-help-those-in-boro-park", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4319 14th Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Borough Park", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11219", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.636432, "longitude": -73.986666}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 608-7065", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "May be closed during Jewish holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Offers job training/assistance"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Kosher food available"}]}
